name: Angelo Madolaria
title: Fullstack Programmer | Designer
about: I’m a 3rd-year college student passionate about coding, design, and digital editing. I love creating projects that blend creativity and technology, turning ideas into functional and visually appealing solutions. Always eager to learn and take on new challenges, I aim to make an impact through innovation and design.

Creating software or applications through writing code. Enhancing and refining digital content like images, videos, or text..
